mapper.insert:
select program_seq.nextval from dual
insert into program(proNo, adminNo, proCateNo, proName, proSponsor, proPrice, proStartDate, regdate, proType, imageUrl, regiEndDate) values(#{proNo}, #{adminNo}, #{proCateNo}, #{proName}, #{proSponsor}, #{proPrice}, #{proStartDate}, #{regdate}, #{proType}, #{imageUrl}, #{regiEndDate})
